```typescript
/**
 * ìë™ ë™ê¸°í™” ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬
 * 
 * node-cronì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìë³„ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‘ì—…ì„ ì˜ˆì•½í•˜ê³  ì‹¤í–‰í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
 */

import cron from 'node-cron';
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';
import NaverApiClient from './naver-api';
import { triggerWebhooks, WebhookPayload } from './webhook';

// ì‹¤í–‰ ì¤‘ì¸ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—…ë“¤ì„ ì €ì¥
const cronJobs = new Map<string, cron.ScheduledTask>();

/**
 * ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬ ì´ˆê¸°í™”
 * ëª¨ë“  í™œì„±í™”ëœ ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ì„ ë¡œë“œí•˜ê³  í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡
 */
export async function initScheduler() {
  console.log('ğŸ”„ ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬ ì´ˆê¸°í™” ì¤‘...');
  
  try {
    // í™œì„±í™”ëœ ëª¨ë“  ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ ì¡°íšŒ
    const schedules = await db.syncSchedule.findMany({
      where: {
        isEnabled: true,
      },
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            id: true,
            email: true,
            shopName: true,
            naverClientId: true,
            naverClientSecret: true,
            naverApiEnabled: true,
          },
        },
      },
    });

    console.log(`ğŸ“‹ í™œì„±í™”ëœ ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ ${schedules.length}ê°œ ë°œê²¬`);

    // ê° ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ì— ëŒ€í•´ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡
    for (const schedule of schedules) {
      await registerCronJob(schedule);
    }

    console.log('âœ… ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬ ì´ˆê¸°í™” ì™„ë£Œ');
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('âŒ ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬ ì´ˆê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨:', error);
  }
}

/**
 * í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡
 */
export async function registerCronJob(schedule: any) {
  const { id, userId, cronExpression, timezone } = schedule;

  // ì´ë¯¸ ë“±ë¡ëœ ì‘ì—…ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ì¤‘ì§€
  if (cronJobs.has(userId)) {
    cronJobs.get(userId)?.stop();
    cronJobs.delete(userId);
  }

  try {
    // í¬ë¡  í‘œí˜„ì‹ ìœ íš¨ì„± ê²€ì‚¬
    if (!cron.validate(cronExpression)) {
      console.error(`âŒ ì˜ëª»ëœ cron í‘œí˜„ì‹: ${cronExpression}`);
      return;
    }

    // í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ìƒì„±
    const task = cron.schedule(
      cronExpression,
      async () => {
        console.log(`ğŸš€ ìë™ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹œì‘ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`);
        await executeSyncJob(userId);
      },
      {
        scheduled: true,
        timezone: timezone || 'Asia/Seoul',
      }
    );

    cronJobs.set(userId, task);
    console.log(`âœ… í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, í‘œí˜„ì‹: ${cronExpression}`);

    // ë‹¤ìŒ ì‹¤í–‰ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚° ë° ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await updateNextRunTime(id, cronExpression, timezone);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`âŒ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì‹¤íŒ¨ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`, error);
  }
}

/**
 * í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ì¤‘ì§€
 */
export function stopCronJob(userId: string) {
  if (cronJobs.has(userId)) {
    cronJobs.get(userId)?.stop();
    cronJobs.delete(userId);
    console.log(`â¹ï¸ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ì¤‘ì§€ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`);
  }
}

/**
 * ë™ê¸°í™” ì‘ì—… ì‹¤í–‰
 */
export async function executeSyncJob(userId: string) {
  const startTime = Date.now();
  let status: 'SUCCESS' | 'FAILED' = 'SUCCESS';
  let errorLog: string | null = null;
  let itemsTotal = 0;
  let itemsSynced = 0;
  let itemsFailed = 0;

  try {
    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ ì •ë³´ ì¡°íšŒ
    const schedule = await db.syncSchedule.findUnique({
      where: { userId },
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            naverClientId: true,
            naverClientSecret: true,
            naverApiEnabled: true,
            email: true,
            shopName: true,
          },
        },
      },
    });

    if (!schedule) {
      throw new Error('ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
    }

    // ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™”
    if (schedule.syncProducts) {
      const syncResult = await syncProducts(userId, schedule.user);
      itemsTotal = syncResult.total;
      itemsSynced = syncResult.synced;
      itemsFailed = syncResult.failed;

      if (syncResult.failed > 0) {
        status = 'FAILED';
        errorLog = `${syncResult.failed}ê°œ ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨`;
      }
    }

    // ë™ê¸°í™” ë¡œê·¸ ì €ì¥
    await db.syncLog.create({
      data: {
        userId,
        syncType: 'AUTO_SYNC',
        status,
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        errorLog,
      },
    });

    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await db.syncSchedule.update({
      where: { id: schedule.id },
      data: {
        lastRun: new Date(),
        lastStatus: status,
        totalRuns: { increment: 1 },
        successRuns: status === 'SUCCESS' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
        failedRuns: status === 'FAILED' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
      },
    });

    const duration = Date.now() - startTime;
    console.log(`âœ… ë™ê¸°í™” ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, ìƒíƒœ: ${status}, ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: ${duration}ms`);

    // ì•Œë¦¼ ì „ì†¡
    if (
```

```typescript
 * ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ëŸ¬ ì´ˆê¸°í™”

/**
 * í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡
 */
export async function registerCronJob(schedule: any) {
  const { id, userId, cronExpression, timezone } = schedule;

  // ì´ë¯¸ ë“±ë¡ëœ ì‘ì—…ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ì¤‘ì§€
  if (cronJobs.has(userId)) {
    cronJobs.get(userId)?.stop();
    cronJobs.delete(userId);
  }

  try {
    // í¬ë¡  í‘œí˜„ì‹ ìœ íš¨ì„± ê²€ì‚¬
    if (!cron.validate(cronExpression)) {
      console.error(`âŒ ì˜ëª»ëœ cron í‘œí˜„ì‹: ${cronExpression}`);
      return;
    }

    // í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ìƒì„±
    const task = cron.schedule(
      cronExpression,
      async () => {
        console.log(`ğŸš€ ìë™ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹œì‘ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`);
        await executeSyncJob(userId);
      },
      {
        scheduled: true,
        timezone: timezone || 'Asia/Seoul',
      }
    );

    cronJobs.set(userId, task);
    console.log(`âœ… í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, í‘œí˜„ì‹: ${cronExpression}`);

    // ë‹¤ìŒ ì‹¤í–‰ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚° ë° ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await updateNextRunTime(id, cronExpression, timezone);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`âŒ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì‹¤íŒ¨ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`, error);
  }
}

    cronJobs.delete(userId);

  }
}

/**
 * ë™ê¸°í™” ì‘ì—… ì‹¤í–‰
 */
export async function executeSyncJob(userId: string) {
  const startTime = Date.now();
  let status: 'SUCCESS' | 'FAILED' = 'SUCCESS';
  let errorLog: string | null = null;
  let itemsTotal = 0;
  let itemsSynced = 0;
  let itemsFailed = 0;

  try {
    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ ì •ë³´ ì¡°íšŒ
    const schedule = await db.syncSchedule.findUnique({
      where: { userId },
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            naverClientId: true,
            naverClientSecret: true,
            naverApiEnabled: true,
            email: true,
            shopName: true,
          },
        },
      },
    });

    if (!schedule) {
      throw new Error('ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
    }

    // ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™”
    if (schedule.syncProducts) {
      const syncResult = await syncProducts(userId, schedule.user);
      itemsTotal = syncResult.total;
      itemsSynced = syncResult.synced;
      itemsFailed = syncResult.failed;

      if (syncResult.failed > 0) {
        status = 'FAILED';
        errorLog = `${syncResult.failed}ê°œ ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨`;
      }
    }

    // ë™ê¸°í™” ë¡œê·¸ ì €ì¥
    await db.syncLog.create({
      data: {
        userId,
        syncType: 'AUTO_SYNC',
        status,
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        errorLog,
      },
    });

    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await db.syncSchedule.update({
      where: { id: schedule.id },
      data: {
        lastRun: new Date(),
        lastStatus: status,
        totalRuns: { increment: 1 },
        successRuns: status === 'SUCCESS' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
        failedRuns: status === 'FAILED' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
      },
    });

    const duration = Date.now() - startTime;
    console.log(`âœ… ë™ê¸°í™” ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, ìƒíƒœ: ${status}, ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: ${duration}ms`);

    // ì•Œë¦¼ ì „ì†¡
    if (
      (status === 'SUCCESS' && schedule.notifyOnSuccess) ||
      (status === 'FAILED' && schedule.notifyOnError)
    ) {
      await sendNotification(schedule, status, {
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        duration,
      });
    }

    // ì›¹í›… íŠ¸ë¦¬ê±°
    const webhookPayload: WebhookPayload = {
      event: status === 'SUCCESS' ? 'sync.success' : 'sync.error',
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
      data: {
        userId,
        shopName: schedule.user.shopName || undefined,
        status,
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        duration,
      },
    };
    await triggerWebhooks(userId, webhookPayload);
  } catch (error: any) {
    status = 'FAILED';
    errorLog = error.message;
    console.error(`âŒ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`, error);

    // ì‹¤íŒ¨ ë¡œê·¸ ì €ì¥
    await db.syncLog.create({
      data: {
        userId,
        syncType: 'AUTO_SYNC',
        status: 'FAILED',
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        errorLog,
      },
    });

    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    const schedule = await db.syncSchedule.findUnique({ where: { userId } });
    if (schedule) {
      await db.syncSchedule.update({
        where: { id: schedule.id },
        data: {
          lastRun: new Date(),
          lastStatus: 'FAILED',
          totalRuns: { increment: 1 },
          failedRuns: { increment: 1 },
        },
      });

      // ì˜¤ë¥˜ ì•Œë¦¼
      if (schedule.notifyOnError) {
        await sendNotification(schedule, 'FAILED', {
          error: errorLog,
        });
      }
    }
  }
}

/**
```
```typescript
 * ë™ê¸°í™” ì‘ì—… ì‹¤í–‰
 */
export async function executeSyncJob(userId: string) {
  const startTime = Date.now();
  let status: 'SUCCESS' | 'FAILED' = 'SUCCESS';
  let errorLog: string | null = null;
  let itemsTotal = 0;
  let itemsSynced = 0;
  let itemsFailed = 0;

  try {
    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ ì •ë³´ ì¡°íšŒ
    const schedule = await db.syncSchedule.findUnique({
      where: { userId },
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            naverClientId: true,
            naverClientSecret: true,
            naverApiEnabled: true,
            email: true,
            shopName: true,
          },
        },
      },
    });

    if (!schedule) {
      throw new Error('ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
    }

    // ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™”
    if (schedule.syncProducts) {
      const syncResult = await syncProducts(userId, schedule.user);
      itemsTotal = syncResult.total;
      itemsSynced = syncResult.synced;
      itemsFailed = syncResult.failed;

      if (syncResult.failed > 0) {
        status = 'FAILED';
        errorLog = `${syncResult.failed}ê°œ ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨`;
      }
    }

    // ë™ê¸°í™” ë¡œê·¸ ì €ì¥
    await db.syncLog.create({
      data: {
        userId,
        syncType: 'AUTO_SYNC',
        status,
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        errorLog,
      },
    });

    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await db.syncSchedule.update({
      where: { id: schedule.id },
      data: {
        lastRun: new Date(),
        lastStatus: status,
        totalRuns: { increment: 1 },
        successRuns: status === 'SUCCESS' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
        failedRuns: status === 'FAILED' ? { increment: 1 } : undefined,
      },
    });

    const duration = Date.now() - startTime;
    console.log(`âœ… ë™ê¸°í™” ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, ìƒíƒœ: ${status}, ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: ${duration}ms`);

    // ì•Œë¦¼ ì „ì†¡
    if (
      (status === 'SUCCESS' && schedule.notifyOnSuccess) ||
      (status === 'FAILED' && schedule.notifyOnError)
    ) {
      await sendNotification(schedule, status, {
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        duration,
      });
    }

    // ì›¹í›… íŠ¸ë¦¬ê±°
    const webhookPayload: WebhookPayload = {
      event: status === 'SUCCESS' ? 'sync.success' : 'sync.error',
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
      data: {
        userId,
        shopName: schedule.user.shopName || undefined,
        status,
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        duration,
      },
    };
    await triggerWebhooks(userId, webhookPayload);
  } catch (error: any) {
    status = 'FAILED';
    errorLog = error.message;
    console.error(`âŒ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹¤íŒ¨ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`, error);

    // ì‹¤íŒ¨ ë¡œê·¸ ì €ì¥
    await db.syncLog.create({
      data: {
        userId,
        syncType: 'AUTO_SYNC',
        status: 'FAILED',
        itemsTotal,
        itemsSynced,
        itemsFailed,
        errorLog,
      },
    });

    // ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¤„ í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    const schedule = await db.syncSchedule.findUnique({ where: { userId } });
    if (schedule) {
      await db.syncSchedule.update({
        where: { id: schedule.id },
        data: {
          lastRun: new Date(),
          lastStatus: 'FAILED',
          totalRuns: { increment: 1 },
          failedRuns: { increment: 1 },
        },
      });

      // ì˜¤ë¥˜ ì•Œë¦¼
      if (schedule.notifyOnError) {
        await sendNotification(schedule, 'FAILED', {
          error: errorLog,
        });
      }

      // ì›¹í›… íŠ¸ë¦¬ê±°
      const webhookPayload: WebhookPayload = {
        event: 'sync.error',
        timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
        data: {
          userId,
          shopName: schedule.user?.shopName || undefined,
          status: 'FAILED',
          itemsTotal,
          itemsSynced,
          itemsFailed,
          error: errorLog || undefined,
        },
      };
      await triggerWebhooks(userId, webhookPayload);
    }
  }
}

/**
 * ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™”
 */
async function syncProducts(userId: string, user: any) {
  let total = 0;
  let synced = 0;
  let failed = 0;

  try {
    // ë„¤ì´ë²„ APIê°€ í™œì„±í™”ë˜ì–´ ìˆëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸
    if (!user.naverApiEnabled || !user.naverClientId || !user.naverClientSecret) {
      // API ë¯¸ì„¤ì • ì‹œ ìƒ˜í”Œ ë°ì´í„° ë™ê¸°í™”
      console.log('âš ï¸ ë„¤ì´ë²„ API ë¯¸ì„¤ì • - ìƒ˜í”Œ ë°ì´í„° ì‚¬ìš©');
      return { total: 0, synced: 0, failed: 0 };
    }

    // ë„¤ì´ë²„ API í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ìƒì„±
    const naverClient = new NaverApiClient(user.naverClientId, user.naverClientSecret);

    // ë„¤ì´ë²„ì—ì„œ ëª¨ë“  ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ
    const naverProducts = await naverClient.getAllProducts();
    total = naverProducts.length;

    // ê° ìƒí’ˆì„ DBì— ì €ì¥/ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    for (const naverProduct of naverProducts) {
      try {
        const productData = naverClient.transformNaverProduct(naverProduct);

        // ê¸°ì¡´ ìƒí’ˆ í™•ì¸
        const existingProduct = await db.product.findFirst({
          where: {
            userId,
            naverProductId: productData.naverProductId,
          },
        });

        if (existingProduct) {
          // ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
          await db.product.update({
            where: { id: existingProduct.id },
            data: {
              ...productData,
              lastSyncedAt: new Date(),
              syncStatus: 'SYNCED',
              syncError: null,
            },
          });
        } else {
          // ìƒì„±
          await db.product.create({
            data: {
              userId,
              ...productData,
              lastSyncedAt: new Date(),
              syncStatus: 'SYNCED',
            },
          });
        }

        synced++;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('ìƒí’ˆ ë™ê¸°í™” ì˜¤ë¥˜:', error);
        failed++;
      }
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('ìƒí’ˆ ëª©ë¡ ì¡°íšŒ ì˜¤ë¥˜:', error);
    throw error;
  }

  return { total, synced, failed };
}

  try {
```

```typescript
export async function registerCronJob(schedule: any) {
  const { id, userId, cronExpression, timezone } = schedule;

  // ì´ë¯¸ ë“±ë¡ëœ ì‘ì—…ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ì¤‘ì§€
  if (cronJobs.has(userId)) {

      return;

    // í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ìƒì„±

      cronExpression,

        console.log(`ğŸš€ ìë™ ë™ê¸°í™” ì‹œì‘ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`);
        await executeSyncJob(userId);
      },
      {
        scheduled: true,
        timezone: timezone || 'Asia/Seoul',
      }
    );

    cronJobs.set(userId, task);
    console.log(`âœ… í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì™„ë£Œ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}, í‘œí˜„ì‹: ${cronExpression}`);

    // ë‹¤ìŒ ì‹¤í–‰ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚° ë° ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    await updateNextRunTime(id, cronExpression, timezone);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`âŒ í¬ë¡  ì‘ì—… ë“±ë¡ ì‹¤íŒ¨ - ì‚¬ìš©ì: ${userId}`, error);
  }
}

  try {
```

```typescript
    const body = await req.json();
```

```typescript
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { getServerSession } from 'next-auth';
import { authOptions } from '@/lib/auth';
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';
import { encrypt } from '@/lib/naver-api';

// ì›¹í›… ìƒì„¸ ì¡°íšŒ
export async function GET(
  req: Request,
  { params }: { params: { id: string } }
) {
  try {
    const session = await getServerSession(authOptions);

    if (!session?.user?.id) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì¸ì¦ì´ í•„ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 401 }
      );
    }

    const webhook = await db.webhook.findFirst({
      where: {
        id: params.id,
        userId: session.user.id,
      },
      include: {
        logs: {
          orderBy: { createdAt: 'desc' },
          take: 10,
        },
      },
    });

    if (!webhook) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì›¹í›…ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 404 }
      );
    }

    return NextResponse.json({
      ok: true,
      webhook,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Get webhook error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'ì›¹í›… ì¡°íšŒ ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}

// ì›¹í›… ìˆ˜ì •
export async function PUT(
  req: Request,
  { params }: { params: { id: string } }
) {
  try {
    const session = await getServerSession(authOptions);

    if (!session?.user?.id) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì¸ì¦ì´ í•„ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 401 }
      );
    }

    // ì›¹í›… ì¡´ì¬ í™•ì¸
    const existingWebhook = await db.webhook.findFirst({
      where: {
        id: params.id,
        userId: session.user.id,
      },
    });

    if (!existingWebhook) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì›¹í›…ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 404 }
      );
    }

    const body = await req.json();
    const {
      name,
      url,
      type,
      isEnabled,
      triggerOnSuccess,
      triggerOnError,
      authType,
      authValue,
      customHeaders,
    } = body;

    // URL ê²€ì¦
    if (url) {
      try {
        new URL(url);
      } catch (e) {
        return NextResponse.json(
          { error: 'ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ URL í˜•ì‹ì´ ì•„ë‹™ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
          { status: 400 }
        );
      }
    }

    // authValue ì•”í˜¸í™”
    let encryptedAuthValue = existingWebhook.authValue;
    if (authValue) {
      encryptedAuthValue = encrypt(authValue);
    } else if (authType === 'NONE') {
      encryptedAuthValue = null;
    }

    // ì›¹í›… ìˆ˜ì •
    const webhook = await db.webhook.update({
      where: { id: params.id },
      data: {
        name: name || existingWebhook.name,
        url: url || existingWebhook.url,
        type: type || existingWebhook.type,
        isEnabled: isEnabled !== undefined ? isEnabled : existingWebhook.isEnabled,
        triggerOnSuccess:
          triggerOnSuccess !== undefined ? triggerOnSuccess : existingWebhook.triggerOnSuccess,
        triggerOnError:
          triggerOnError !== undefined ? triggerOnError : existingWebhook.triggerOnError,
        authType: authType !== undefined ? authType : existingWebhook.authType,
        authValue: encryptedAuthValue,
        customHeaders:
          customHeaders !== undefined
            ? customHeaders
              ? JSON.stringify(customHeaders)
              : null
            : existingWebhook.customHeaders,
      },
    });

    return NextResponse.json({
      ok: true,
      webhook,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Update webhook error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'ì›¹í›… ìˆ˜ì • ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}

// ì›¹í›… ì‚­ì œ
export async function DELETE(
  req: Request,
  { params }: { params: { id: string } }
) {
  try {
    const session = await getServerSession(authOptions);

    if (!session?.user?.id) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì¸ì¦ì´ í•„ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 401 }
      );
    }

    // ì›¹í›… ì¡´ì¬ í™•ì¸
    const webhook = await db.webhook.findFirst({
      where: {
        id: params.id,
        userId: session.user.id,
      },
    });

    if (!webhook) {
      return NextResponse.json(
        { error: 'ì›¹í›…ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
        { status: 404 }
      );
    }

    // ì›¹í›… ì‚­ì œ
    await db.webhook.delete({
      where: { id: params.id },
    });

    return NextResponse.json({
      ok: true,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Delete webhook error:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'ì›¹í›… ì‚­ì œ ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}
```

```typescriptreact
interface Webhook {

  const [webhooks, setWebhooks] = useState<Webhook[]>([]);

    name: '',
    url: '',
    type: 'CUSTOM',
    isEnabled: true,
    triggerOnSuccess: true,
    triggerOnError: true,
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchWebhooks();

  const fetchWebhooks = async () => {
    try {

      const response = await fetch(url, {

          name: '',

          isEnabled: true,
          triggerOnSuccess: true,
          triggerOnError: true,

        fetchWebhooks();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to save webhook:', error);
    }

      if (response.ok) {
        fetchWebhooks();

      console.error('Failed to delete webhook:', error);
    }

}
```

```typescriptreact
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';
import ProductCard from './ProductCard';
import Link from 'next/link';

interface ProductListProps {
  searchParams: {
    sort?: string;
    category?: string;
    page?: string;
  };
}

async function getProducts(searchParams: ProductListProps['searchParams']) {
  const page = parseInt(searchParams.page || '1');
  const pageSize = 20;
  const skip = (page - 1) * pageSize;

  // ì •ë ¬ ì˜µì…˜
  let orderBy: any = { createdAt: 'desc' };
  if (searchParams.sort === 'price_low') {
    orderBy = { price: 'asc' };
  } else if (searchParams.sort === 'price_high') {
    orderBy = { price: 'desc' };
  } else if (searchParams.sort === 'latest') {
    orderBy = { createdAt: 'desc' };
  }

  // í•„í„° ì¡°ê±´
  const where: any = {
    isActive: true,
    isGoogleExposed: true,
  };

  if (searchParams.category) {
    where.category1 = searchParams.category;
  }

  try {
    const [products, total] = await Promise.all([
      db.product.findMany({
        where,
        orderBy,
        skip,
        take: pageSize,
        include: {
          user: {
            select: {
              shopName: true,
            },
          },
        },
      }),
      db.product.count({ where }),
    ]);

    const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / pageSize);

    return { products, total, totalPages, currentPage: page };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to fetch products:', error);
    return { products: [], total: 0, totalPages: 0, currentPage: 1 };
  }
}

export default async function ProductList({ searchParams }: ProductListProps) {
  const { products, total, totalPages, currentPage } = await getProducts(searchParams);

  const sortOptions = [
    { value: 'latest', label: 'ìµœì‹ ìˆœ' },
    { value: 'price_low', label: 'ë‚®ì€ ê°€ê²©ìˆœ' },
    { value: 'price_high', label: 'ë†’ì€ ê°€ê²©ìˆœ' },
  ];

  const currentSort = searchParams.sort || 'latest';

  return (
    <div className="container-custom">
      {/* í—¤ë” */}
      <div className="mb-8">
        <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-2">ì „ì²´ ìƒí’ˆ</h1>
        <p className="text-white/60">ì´ {total}ê°œì˜ ìƒí’ˆ</p>
      </div>

      {/* í•„í„° & ì •ë ¬ */}
      <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-8">
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
          {sortOptions.map((option) => (
            <Link
              key={option.value}
              href={`/products?sort=${option.value}${
                searchParams.category ? `&category=${searchParams.category}` : ''
              }`}
              className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors ${
                currentSort === option.value
                  ? 'bg-brand-neon text-brand-navy'
                  : 'bg-white/5 text-white/80 hover:bg-white/10'
              }`}
            >
              {option.label}
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ìƒí’ˆ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ */}
      {products.length === 0 ? (
        <div className="glass-card p-12 text-center">
          <p className="text-white/60 text-lg">ìƒí’ˆì´ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</p>
        </div>
      ) : (
        <>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-12">
            {products.map((product) => (
              <ProductCard key={product.id} product={product} />
            ))}
          </div>

          {/* í˜ì´ì§€ë„¤ì´ì…˜ */}
          {totalPages > 1 && (
            <div className="flex justify-center gap-2">
              {currentPage > 1 && (
                <Link
                  href={`/products?page=${currentPage - 1}${
                    searchParams.sort ? `&sort=${searchParams.sort}` : ''
                  }${searchParams.category ? `&category=${searchParams.category}` : ''}`}
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-white/5 rounded-lg text-white hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors"
                >
                  ì´ì „
                </Link>
              )}

              {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
                const pageNum = i + 1;
                return (
                  <Link
                    key={pageNum}
                    href={`/products?page=${pageNum}${
                      searchParams.sort ? `&sort=${searchParams.sort}` : ''
                    }${searchParams.category ? `&category=${searchParams.category}` : ''}`}
                    className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors ${
                      currentPage === pageNum
                        ? 'bg-brand-neon text-brand-navy font-bold'
                        : 'bg-white/5 text-white hover:bg-white/10'
                    }`}
                  >
                    {pageNum}
                  </Link>
                );
              })}

              {currentPage < totalPages && (
                <Link
                  href={`/products?page=${currentPage + 1}${
                    searchParams.sort ? `&sort=${searchParams.sort}` : ''
                  }${searchParams.category ? `&category=${searchParams.category}` : ''}`}
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-white/5 rounded-lg text-white hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors"
                >
                  ë‹¤ìŒ
                </Link>
              )}
            </div>
          )}
        </>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```typescriptreact
import { notFound } from 'next/navigation';
import { Metadata } from 'next';
import Header from '@/components/layout/Header';
import Footer from '@/components/layout/Footer';
import ProductDetail from '@/components/products/ProductDetail';
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';

async function getProduct(id: string) {
  try {
    const product = await db.product.findUnique({
      where: { id },
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            shopName: true,
            naverShopUrl: true,
          },
        },
      },
    });

    return product;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to fetch product:', error);
    return null;
  }
}

export async function generateMetadata({
  params,
}: {
  params: { id: string };
}): Promise<Metadata> {
  const product = await getProduct(params.id);

  if (!product) {
    return {
      title: 'ìƒí’ˆì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤ - GConnect',
    };
  }

  const price = product.discountPrice || product.price;

  return {
    title: `${product.name} - GConnect`,
    description: product.description?.substring(0, 155) || `${product.name} - ${price.toLocaleString()}ì›`,
    openGraph: {
      title: product.name,
      description: product.description?.substring(0, 155) || product.name,
      images: product.imageUrl ? [product.imageUrl] : [],
      type: 'website',
    },
    twitter: {
      card: 'summary_large_image',
      title: product.name,
      description: product.description?.substring(0, 155) || product.name,
      images: product.imageUrl ? [product.imageUrl] : [],
    },
  };
}

export default async function ProductDetailPage({
  params,
}: {
  params: { id: string };
}) {
  const product = await getProduct(params.id);

  if (!product) {
    notFound();
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen flex flex-col">
      <Header />
      <main className="flex-1 section-padding">
        <ProductDetail product={product} />
      </main>
      <Footer />
    </div>
  );
}
```

```typescriptreact
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';
import ProductCard from '../products/ProductCard';
import Link from 'next/link';
import { MagnifyingGlassIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline';

interface SearchResultsProps {
  searchParams: {
    q?: string;
    sort?: string;
    page?: string;
  };
}

async function searchProducts(searchParams: SearchResultsProps['searchParams']) {
  const query = searchParams.q || '';
  const page = parseInt(searchParams.page || '1');
  const pageSize = 20;
  const skip = (page - 1) * pageSize;

  if (!query.trim()) {
    return { products: [], total: 0, totalPages: 0, currentPage: 1, query: '' };
  }

  // ì •ë ¬ ì˜µì…˜
  let orderBy: any = { createdAt: 'desc' };
  if (searchParams.sort === 'price_low') {
    orderBy = { price: 'asc' };
  } else if (searchParams.sort === 'price_high') {
    orderBy = { price: 'desc' };
  } else if (searchParams.sort === 'latest') {
    orderBy = { createdAt: 'desc' };
  }

  // ê²€ìƒ‰ ì¡°ê±´
  const where: any = {
    isActive: true,
    isGoogleExposed: true,
    OR: [
      { name: { contains: query } },
      { description: { contains: query } },
      { category1: { contains: query } },
      { category2: { contains: query } },
      { category3: { contains: query } },
    ],
  };

  try {
    const [products, total] = await Promise.all([
      db.product.findMany({
        where,
        orderBy,
        skip,
        take: pageSize,
        include: {
          user: {
            select: {
              shopName: true,
            },
          },
        },
      }),
      db.product.count({ where }),
    ]);

    const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / pageSize);

    return { products, total, totalPages, currentPage: page, query };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to search products:', error);
    return { products: [], total: 0, totalPages: 0, currentPage: 1, query };
  }
}

    <div className="container-custom">
      {/* ê²€ìƒ‰ í—¤ë” */}
      <div className="mb-8">

          <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold">
            {query ? (
              <>
                '<span className="gradient-text">{query}</span>' ê²€ìƒ‰ ê²°ê³¼
              </>
            ) : (
              'ìƒí’ˆ ê²€ìƒ‰'
            )}
          </h1>
        </div>
        {query && (
          <p className="text-white/60">
            {total > 0 ? `${total}ê°œì˜ ìƒí’ˆì„ ì°¾ì•˜ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤` : 'ê²€ìƒ‰ ê²°ê³¼ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤'}
          </p>
        )}
      </div>

      {!query ? (
        // ê²€ìƒ‰ì–´ ì—†ìŒ
        <div className="glass-card p-12 text-center">
          <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="w-16 h-16 text-white/20 mx-auto mb-4" />
          <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-white mb-2">
            ê²€ìƒ‰ì–´ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”
          </h3>
          <p className="text-white/60">
            ìƒë‹¨ ê²€ìƒ‰ë°”ì—ì„œ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ìƒí’ˆì„ ê²€ìƒ‰í•´ë³´ì„¸ìš”
          </p>
        </div>
      ) : products.length === 0 ? (
        // ê²€ìƒ‰ ê²°ê³¼ ì—†ìŒ
        <div className="glass-card p-12 text-center">

          </p>
          <p className="text-white/40 text-sm mb-6">
            ë‹¤ë¥¸ ê²€ìƒ‰ì–´ë¡œ ì‹œë„í•´ë³´ì„¸ìš”
          </p>
          <Link href="/products" className="btn-primary inline-block">
```

```typescript
import { MetadataRoute } from 'next';
import { db } from '@gconnect/db';

export default async function sitemap(): Promise<MetadataRoute.Sitemap> {
  const baseUrl = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_PRODUCT_URL || 'http://localhost:3001';

  try {
    // í™œì„±í™”ëœ ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ
    const products = await db.product.findMany({
      where: {
        isActive: true,
        isGoogleExposed: true,
      },
      select: {
        id: true,
        updatedAt: true,
      },
      orderBy: {
        updatedAt: 'desc',
      },
    });

    // ìƒí’ˆ í˜ì´ì§€ë“¤
    const productUrls = products.map((product) => ({
      url: `${baseUrl}/products/${product.id}`,
      lastModified: product.updatedAt,
      changeFrequency: 'daily' as const,
      priority: 0.8,
    }));

    return [
      {
        url: baseUrl,
        lastModified: new Date(),
        changeFrequency: 'daily',
        priority: 1,
      },
      {
        url: `${baseUrl}/products`,
        lastModified: new Date(),
        changeFrequency: 'hourly',
        priority: 0.9,
      },
      {
        url: `${baseUrl}/search`,
        lastModified: new Date(),
        changeFrequency: 'weekly',
        priority: 0.7,
      },
      ...productUrls,
    ];
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to generate sitemap:', error);
    return [
      {
        url: baseUrl,
        lastModified: new Date(),
        changeFrequency: 'daily',
        priority: 1,
      },
    ];
  }
}
```

```typescript
import { MetadataRoute } from 'next';

export default function robots(): MetadataRoute.Robots {
  const baseUrl = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_PRODUCT_URL || 'http://localhost:3001';

  return {
    rules: [
      {
        userAgent: '*',
        allow: '/',
        disallow: ['/api/'],
      },
      {
        userAgent: 'Googlebot',
        allow: '/',
      },
    ],
    sitemap: `${baseUrl}/sitemap.xml`,
  };
}
```

```typescript
// ê´€ë¦¬ì ê³„ì • (ì‹¤ì œë¡œëŠ” DBì— ì €ì¥í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ í™˜ê²½ ë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ê´€ë¦¬)
const ADMIN_CREDENTIALS = {

};

export const authOptions: NextAuthOptions = {

    CredentialsProvider({
      name: 'Credentials',
      credentials: {
        email: { label: 'Email', type: 'email' },
        password: { label: 'Password', type: 'password' },
      },
      async authorize(credentials) {
        if (!credentials?.email || !credentials?.password) {
          throw new Error('ì´ë©”ì¼ê³¼ ë¹„ë°€ë²ˆí˜¸ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.');
        }

        // ê´€ë¦¬ì ê³„ì • í™•ì¸
        if (
          credentials.email === ADMIN_CREDENTIALS.email &&
          credentials.password === ADMIN_CREDENTIALS.password

            id: 'admin',

            name: 'Admin',
            role: 'ADMIN',

        }

        throw new Error('ì˜ëª»ëœ ê´€ë¦¬ì ê³„ì • ì •ë³´ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      },
    }),
  ],
  callbacks: {
    async jwt({ token, user }) {
      if (user) {
        token.userId = user.id;
        token.role = (user as any).role || 'ADMIN';
      }
      return token;
    },
    async session({ session, token }) {
      if (session.user) {
        (session.user as any).id = token.userId;
        (session.user as any).role = token.role;
      }
      return session;
    },
  },
  pages: {
    signIn: '/login',
  },
  session: {
    strategy: 'jwt',
  },
  secret: process.env.NEXTAUTH_SECRET,
};
```

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { getServerSession } from 'next-auth';

    const totalUsers = await prisma.user.count();
```

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { getServerSession } from 'next-auth';
import { authOptions } from '@/lib/auth';
import { prisma } from '@gconnect/db';

export async function GET(req: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const session = await getServerSession(authOptions);

    if (!session || (session.user as any).role !== 'ADMIN') {
      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'ê¶Œí•œì´ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' }, { status: 401 });
    }

    const { searchParams } = new URL(req.url);
    const status = searchParams.get('status') || 'ALL';
    const search = searchParams.get('search') || '';

    const where: any = {};

    if (status !== 'ALL') {
      where.status = status;
    }

    if (search) {
      where.OR = [
        { name: { contains: search } },
        {
          user: {
            OR: [
              { email: { contains: search } },
              { shopName: { contains: search } },
            ],
          },
        },
      ];
    }

    const products = await prisma.product.findMany({
      where,
      include: {
        user: {
          select: {
            email: true,
            shopName: true,
          },
        },
      },
      orderBy: {
        createdAt: 'desc',
      },
      take: 100,
    });

    return NextResponse.json(products);
  } catch (error: any) {
    console.error('ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}
```

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { prisma } from '@gconnect/db';

export async function GET(req: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const { searchParams } = new URL(req.url);
    const sort = searchParams.get('sort') || 'latest';
    const page = parseInt(searchParams.get('page') || '1');
    const limit = 20;
    const skip = (page - 1) * limit;

    // ì •ë ¬ ì˜µì…˜
    let orderBy: any = { createdAt: 'desc' };
    if (sort === 'price_low') {
      orderBy = { price: 'asc' };
    } else if (sort === 'price_high') {
      orderBy = { price: 'desc' };
    }

    // ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ
    const [products, total] = await Promise.all([
      prisma.product.findMany({
        where: {
          status: 'ACTIVE',
        },
        include: {
          user: {
            select: {
              shopName: true,
            },
          },
        },
        orderBy,
        take: limit,
        skip,
      }),
      prisma.product.count({
        where: {
          status: 'ACTIVE',
        },
      }),
    ]);

    return NextResponse.json({
      products,
      pagination: {
        page,
        limit,
        total,
        totalPages: Math.ceil(total / limit),
      },
    });
  } catch (error: any) {
    console.error('ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ ì‹¤íŒ¨:', error);

      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}
```

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { prisma } from '@gconnect/db';

export async function GET(req: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const { searchParams } = new URL(req.url);
    const q = searchParams.get('q') || '';
    const sort = searchParams.get('sort') || 'latest';
    const page = parseInt(searchParams.get('page') || '1');
    const limit = 20;
    const skip = (page - 1) * limit;

    if (!q) {
      return NextResponse.json({ products: [], pagination: { page, limit, total: 0, totalPages: 0 } });
    }

    // ì •ë ¬ ì˜µì…˜
    let orderBy: any = { createdAt: 'desc' };
    if (sort === 'price_low') {
      orderBy = { price: 'asc' };
    } else if (sort === 'price_high') {
      orderBy = { price: 'desc' };
    }

    // ê²€ìƒ‰ ì¡°ê±´
    const where = {
      status: 'ACTIVE',
      OR: [
        { name: { contains: q } },
        { description: { contains: q } },
        { category: { contains: q } },
      ],
    };

    // ìƒí’ˆ ì¡°íšŒ
    const [products, total] = await Promise.all([
      prisma.product.findMany({
        where,
        include: {
          user: {
            select: {
              shopName: true,
            },
          },
        },
        orderBy,
        take: limit,
        skip,
      }),
      prisma.product.count({ where }),
    ]);

    return NextResponse.json({
      products,
      query: q,
      pagination: {
        page,
        limit,
        total,
        totalPages: Math.ceil(total / limit),
      },
    });
  } catch (error: any) {
    console.error('ê²€ìƒ‰ ì‹¤íŒ¨:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'ê²€ìƒ‰ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}

```
